casebody.data:
KLJUN
v.
ADMR., BUR. OF WORKERS' COMP. 2017-1576 Supreme Court of Ohio. March 14, 2018

CASE ANNOUNCEMENTS

O'Connor, C.J., and Fischer and DeGenaro, JJ., dissent.

APPEALS ACCEPTED FOR REVIEW

Cause accepted on proposition of law No. I.

O'Donnell, Kennedy, and DeWine, JJ., would accept the cause on all propositions of law.
